@Section

Package upnp

UPNP Media Server. 
<dependency>
  <groupId>ball</groupId>
  <artifactId>upnp-media-server</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
</dependency>

Spring Boot Artifacts

application.properties

# $Id: application.properties 6989 2020-11-16 22:24:18Z ball $

application.name: upnp-media-server
application.home: ${user.home}/.config/${application.name}

ssdp.product: upnp-media-server/1.0.0-SNAPSHOT

spring.main.banner-mode: OFF
spring.main.headless: false
spring.main.log-startup-info: false

spring.output.ansi.enabled: NEVER

spring.thymeleaf.mode: XML
spring.thymeleaf.servlet.content-type: text/xml
spring.thymeleaf.servlet.produce-partial-output-while-processing: false
spring.thymeleaf.suffix: .xml

server.port: 5000
server.compression.enabled: true

management.server.address: 127.0.0.1
management.server.port: 5001
management.endpoints.web.exposure.include: *
management.endpoints.enabled-by-default: true
management.endpoint.shutdown.enabled: true

spring.jackson.serialization.indent-output: true
spring.jackson.serialization.write-empty-json-arrays: false
spring.jackson.serialization.write-enums-using-to-string: true

logging.file.path: ${application.home}/log
logging.logback.rollingpolicy.max-file-size: 256KB
logging.logback.rollingpolicy.max-history: 8
Author:
Allen D. Ball

    Class Description
    ConnectionManager
    UPnP ConnectionManager Service.
    ContentDirectory
    UPnP ContentDirectory Service.
    DescriptionController
    MediaServer description Controller.
    DiscoveryService
    SSDP discovery Service.
    Launcher
    SpringApplication Launcher.
    MediaServer
    UPnP MediaServer Device which implements ContentDirectory and ConnectionManager Services.
    MediaServer.Device
    MediaServer Device.
    MediaServer.Service
    MediaServer Service.
